trophies.trophyName: The Queen reigns mercilessly over all nightmares.
trophies.trophyDetail: Acquire all trophies.

trophies.trophyName: Revealed the first nightmare to humanity.
trophies.trophyDetail: Clear 1 quest in Quest Mode.

trophies.trophyName: Revealed 10 nightmares.
trophies.trophyDetail: Clear 10 quests in Quest Mode.

trophies.trophyName: Revealed 30 nightmares.
trophies.trophyDetail: Clear 30 quests in Quest Mode.

trophies.trophyName: More than halfway through the long nightmare.
trophies.trophyDetail: Clear 50 quests in Quest Mode.

trophies.trophyName: 100 nightmares have ended.
trophies.trophyDetail: Clear all quests in Quest Mode.

trophies.trophyName: Dark Side Heaven is where souls are pitted against each other to create condensed souls. It's purpose has been achieved.
trophies.trophyDetail: Watch 1 ending in Quest Mode.

trophies.trophyName: Kanata returns to her world, though she has but little time to stay there.
trophies.trophyDetail: Watch 2 endings in Quest Mode.

trophies.trophyName: Kanata Fuyuno's Dark Side Heaven was split into two worlds.
trophies.trophyDetail: Watch all endings in Quest Mode.

trophies.trophyName: Stole 50 Nightmare Fruits
trophies.trophyDetail: Clear 50 rewards in Quest Mode.

trophies.trophyName: Stole 100 Nightmare Fruits
trophies.trophyDetail: Clear 100 rewards in Quest Mode.

trophies.trophyName: Stole 200 Nightmare Fruits
trophies.trophyDetail: Clear 200 rewards in Quest Mode.

trophies.trophyName: Stole all Nightmare Fruits
trophies.trophyDetail: Clear all rewards in Quest Mode.

trophies.trophyName: Pursuit of the 100th nightmare has refined it into a more beautiful nightmare.
trophies.trophyDetail: Clear all quests in Quest Mode at Rank A or higher.

trophies.trophyName: Pursuit of the 100th nightmare has refined it into the most exquisite nightmare.
trophies.trophyDetail: Clear all quests in Quest Mode at Rank S or higher.

trophies.trophyName: Having gained all traps, Velguirie rejoices: “Now to truly enjoy the most exquisite nightmare.”
trophies.trophyDetail: Acquire all traps in Quest Mode.

trophies.trophyName: Having gained all abilities, Velguirie smiles. “Now I can trample all under my foot.”
trophies.trophyDetail: Acquire all abilities in Quest Mode.

trophies.trophyName: Having gathered all flesh, Velguirie fantasizes about the sacrifices that can be made.
trophies.trophyDetail: Acquire all edit parts in Quest Mode.

trophies.trophyName: During her story, Laegrinna, Princess of Darkness, meets the Other Princess.
trophies.trophyDetail: Meet Laegrinna in Quest Mode.

trophies.trophyName: The Other Princess takes the flesh and soul of Laegrinna, Princess of Darkness, and becomes servant to Velguirie.
trophies.trophyDetail: Get Laegrinna as a playable character in Quest Mode.

trophies.trophyName: Millennia, Princess of Deception, sees Velguirie as a human.
trophies.trophyDetail: Meet Millennia in Quest Mode.

trophies.trophyName: Before her flesh and soul are taken, Millennia, Princess of Deception, regains the lost memories of her childhood.
trophies.trophyDetail: Get Millennia as a playable character in Quest Mode.

trophies.trophyName: Reina, Princess of Tragedy, stands quietly apart from curse and adversity.
trophies.trophyDetail: Meet Reina in Quest Mode.

trophies.trophyName: Before having her flesh and soul taken, Reina, Princess of Tragedy, pleads for an end to the revenge.
trophies.trophyDetail: Get Reina as a playable character in Quest Mode.

trophies.trophyName: Allura, Princess of Stigma, is freed from the clutches of evil in Dark Side Heaven.
trophies.trophyDetail: Meet Allura in Quest Mode.

trophies.trophyName: Before having her flesh and soul taken, Allura, Princess of Stigma, enters a world free of betrayal and conspiracy.
trophies.trophyDetail: Get Allura as a playable character in Quest Mode.

trophies.trophyName: Kanata Fuyuno sees Velguirie and is troubled.
trophies.trophyDetail: Meet Kanata Fuyuno in Quest Mode.

trophies.trophyName: Kanata Fuyuno regains her original form.
trophies.trophyDetail: Get Kanata Fuyuno as a playable character in Quest Mode.

trophies.trophyName: Velguirie now has control of the flesh of 5 girls chosen by Ephemera.
trophies.trophyDetail: Get all playable characters in Quest Mode.

trophies.trophyName: 5 Ephemera are released into different worlds. Each stakes her existence on the girl to whom she is drawn.
trophies.trophyDetail: Meet the 5 Ephemera in Quest Mode.

trophies.trophyName: Offered 100 souls to the Great One.
trophies.trophyDetail: Defeat 100 humans in Quest Mode.

trophies.trophyName: Created first sacrifice from stolen flesh.
trophies.trophyDetail: Edit an enemy character in Deception Studio.

trophies.trophyName: Created first Nightmare Memory.
trophies.trophyDetail: Create a video in Deception Studio.

trophies.trophyName: Looked into the Nightmare Memory created at another Dark Side Heaven.
trophies.trophyDetail: Download a video in Deception Studio.

trophies.trophyName: You learned you can create your own nightmare.
trophies.trophyDetail: Create a Cross-Quest in Deception Studio.
